name: Generate Speech (TTS)
description: Generates speech audio from text using TTS-Audio-Suite F5-TTS engine. Supports voice cloning from reference audio files. Models auto-download on first use (~1.2GB per language).

parameter_notes.text: The text to convert to speech. Supports [CharacterName] syntax for multi-speaker. Unlimited length with smart chunking.
parameter_notes.model: TTS model variant. Default: F5-TTS base model. Auto-downloads from HuggingFace.
parameter_notes.voice_reference: Name of a voice reference file (without extension) in ComfyUI/input/ or voices directory. Place a .wav file + matching .txt transcript. Use 'default' for the engine's default voice.
